ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] (Off-Topic) Some advice?
ygData.msgSnippet: Since you make no money from these banners and you want to help out your friends, couldn t you designate a special links page for them? ...
ygData.messageBody:
Since you make no money from these banners and you
want to help out your friends, couldn't you designate
a special links page for them?

--- Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...> wrote:
> This is totally not Bard related, but it is
> EQ-related.
>
> I was (asked? offered?) a place on EverLore.com for
> the EQ Glossary. I've
> turned down one previous offer because the site
> looked like crud, and had
> nothing to offer in return. This one, however, is
> offering to build a
> database to house the glossary (making updates Ooooh
> so easy), at the cost
> of losing my banners. While this may seem like a
> no-brainer (especially
> considering I make NO money from the banners I'm
> currently hosting), they
> are for friends of mine, and I'd hate to lose even
> this piddling little
> advertising for them. Unfortunately, Everlore is
> very strict :P No
> banners from outside sources.
>
> I haven't read the contract yet - waiting on a reply
> about that now. But I
> am really ambivalent about this (I *knew* I'd find a
> way to use that word
> this week ;)
>
> So here's my dilemma - and I'm not saying that you
> guys are going to solve
> it for me - I just need some unbiased input here -
> Do I take the Lady or
> the Tiger?
>
>
> Talies the Wanderer
> Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
> http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
>
